ValidationRule.description: To ensure that end users can only use loss reason picklist values with “(SSSU only)” if the Accounts has Timestamp_SSSU populated. RO - 1594
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(Loss_Reason_Account__c), "(SSSU only)"), ISNULL( Timestamp_SSSU_Account__c )), AND( CONTAINS(TEXT(Loss_Reason_Account__c), "(SSSU only)"), ISCHANGED( Loss_Reason_Account__c ),
NOT( OR( $Profile.Name == "Small Hunter Digital", $Profile.Name == "Head of Small Account Management", $Profile.Name == "VP Sales", $Profile.Name == "System Administrator") ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not authorized to use this loss reason.
